Title: A631 The Largest Brooch I've Seen. Gold Based Irredecent Reds @ 3 1/2" x 5 1/8"
Description: So many places to see a mark or signing, but I find none. In new condition, this gigantic brooch, also being a pendant because of the upper hoop, is a huge 3 1/2" x 5 1/8" and simply beautiful!! In reds of different shapes and sizes and irredecent rhinestones too, make quite a statement piece and please see pictures!! Greetings from Montana...... We have been collectors of unique items for many years. Now we have have acquired several different Estates. Many wonderful items to sell in the coming months. So please check back often. Many exceptional diamond rings and solid gold nugget jewelry, gold rings and rare vintage brooch/pins, along with rare coins also currently listed!!We are striving to have very pleased customers. We always offer free shipping and your purchases will be mailed within 1 business day of cleared payment. We would ask that payments be made within 3 days of purchase. At this time we only ship to the continental United States.All returns are unconditionally accepted. We ask for a 5 star rating based on our unconditional guarantee that you are 100% satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are unsatisfied please send us an email. We will fix any problem for any item you feel was not described properly or you are unsatisfied in any way what so ever. If you are happy with your purchase we would ask you take the time to tell us by giving us 5 star 100% positive feedback, which is our goal... Communication is key....Thank you for your interest in our listings. Enjoy the Day...!
